short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a simple interface to refresh credentials per account in your local aws/config file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension simplifies refreshing your local AWS credentials for each account shared with you via the AWS IAM Identity Center. To make this extension work you need to run the associated node http server at the same time. You can do this by using either the docker image, or running the node application directly, as described in this project's repo:
https://github.com/rad12000/aws-identity-center-credential-manager
